## Context Verification

**Components to Verify:**
- [ ] Context Manager
- [ ] History Tracking
- [ ] Data Persistence

**Test Cases:**
1. Basic Functionality
   - [ ] Context saving
   - [ ] Context retrieval
   - [ ] History tracking

2. Edge Cases
   - [ ] Empty context
   - [ ] Large context
   - [ ] Multiple updates

**Validation:**
- [ ] Data integrity maintained
- [ ] History properly tracked
- [ ] Performance acceptable
